channel.title: Dota 2
channel.description:
This is actually took me by surprise, I found it free on Steam and wow.
It's a mixture between warcraft and league of legends, not sure who copied who here, but its worth the dl and play.

item.title: Dota 2
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[/quote]

are you serious?[/quote]

You’d be surprised at the amount of War3 adaptions of DoTA before DoTA2 came out. Hell, they still run servers today.

item.title: Dota 2
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:2, topic:528271”]For those who play LoL already, the switch isn’t easy, the mechanics are harder, and overall it can be hard to keep up with. Those new to Dota games, jump right in.[/quote]I’ve played lol for a short time, and now I think I’m only going to play Dota for a short time too, but both are fun.

Read full topic
